isis.stitle: TSI 91-16-03 - Instructions For Painting Lower Skirting On Navistar Vehicles

subjectgroup.subject: Instructions For Painting Lower Skirting On Navistar Vehicles

geninfo.para: Navistar dealers often get requests to paint the gray lower skirting on Navistar vehicles the same color as the top coat on the vehicle.
Many of these parts are made of a special TPO plastic. This special plastic is resistant to breaking in cold weather and is also very difficult to make paint adhere to.

step1.para: Clean the part with M600 degreasing solvent or with hot water and soap. Be sure to rinse the part thoroughly.
Clean again with M600, turning the rag often.
Apply two coats of Plastoflex Adhesion Primer, allowing each coat to thoroughly dry.
Top coat with Sikkens Autocryl or Autobase with 30% Elast-O-Actif additive.
If Autobase is applied, follow with Autoclear.

warning.para: Keep paint away from heat, sparks and flame. Vapor may cause flash fire. Use with adequate ventilation. Do not breathe vapors or spray mist. Wear an appropriate, properly fitted respirator (NIOSH/MSHA approved) during and after application, unless air monitoring demonstrates vapor/mist levels are below applicable limits. Follow respirator manufacturer's direction for respirator use. Avoid contact with eyes, skin and clothing. Wash thoroughly after handling. May contain lead. Do not use on toys, furniture or surfaces or other articles that might be chewed by children.
To prevent the possibility of damage to property or personal injury you must follow all warnings given by the paint supplier.

step1.para: Wash the part with 50/50 Isopropanol Alcohol/MEK solution.
Apply one coat of Oceans TY-Coat #1 Adhesive Primer. Allow TY-Coat #1 to dry to touch.
Top coat with Sikkens Autocryl or Autobase with 30% Elast-O-Actif additive.
If Autocryl is applied, follow with Autoclear.

note.para: TY-Coat #1 can be purchased through Sherwin Williams stores. If the Sherwin Williams jobber does not stock TY-Coat #1, the jobber should call 1-800-343-1496 for 24 to 48 hour delivery of Oceans Coatings.
